trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Irvine
There were no other sightings in Irvine on or around July 15th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at the stars and then noticed 3 unknown flying objects. They where all going in diffrent directions. They kept apearing out of no where. they where very bright and all diffrent colors. Most of them had steady movment. Some where hovering and shaky. there was about 25 of them I saw. It was at 12:30. Our airport has a curfew at 11:00. Ufo aircraft made very weird static sound. I tried to film it on my phone but then my phine froze and shut off. After they were gone my phone was working again. The battery drained rapidly. Also tv shutoff.
Viewing Distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
Summary: about 25-30 ufos flying. 3 at a time. Came out of no where
Object Shape: Blimp, Circle, Cylinder, Disc, Oval, Saturn-like, Sphere, Triangle
